import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { items = this.cartService.getItems(); constructor( private cartService: CartService ) { } }
